summary.span: 提供檢視器的基底類別 (Base Class)，其目的是用於顯示固定或流動內容 (分別由 或 表示)。

span.span: Provides a base class for viewers that are intended to display fixed or flow content (represented by a or , respectively).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是最小的基底類別，用來提供文件檢視狀況之間是共通的只有基本功能。 is a minimal base class, intended to provide only basic functionality that is common across document viewing scenarios. 這個基底類別未提供使用者介面。This base class provides no user interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void InvalidatePageViews() cil managed

summary.span: 導致重新建置工作 集合。

span.span: Causes the working collection to be re-built.

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示檢視器中的子項目是否應該當做主版頁面使用。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether or not a child element in the viewer should be used as a master page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此附加的屬性用來指出在集合代表主版頁面。This attached property is used to indicate which in the collection represents master page. 主版頁面對應至目前作用中 （正在顯示） 頁面的檢視器中。The master page corresponds to the page that is currently active (being displayed) in the viewer. 一般而言，有一個成員的集合標示為主版頁面。Typically, no more than one member of the collection is marked as the master page. 如果多個成員的集合標記為主版頁面，然後第一個指示邏輯樹狀結構 （深度優先） 中指定的作用中的主機。If more than one member of the collection is marked as the master page, then the first indicated in the logical tree (depth-first) is designated the active master. 如果沒有任何成員集合會標示為主版頁面中，則主版頁面的預設值的第一個成員為集合。If no members of the collection are marked as the master page, then the master page defaults to the first member of the collection. 使用設定，並將這個屬性附加至指定的項目 （相依性物件） 的方法。Use the method to set and attach this property to a specified element (dependency object). 使用方法來讀取這個值就會從指定的項目附加屬性。Use the method to read the value of this attached property from a specified element. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: 取得目前 的總頁數。

span.span: Gets the total number of pages in the current .

value.span: 在目前的文件中的頁面數目或**0**如果目前已不載入任何文件。

span.span: The number of pages in the current document, or **0** if no document is currently loaded.
This property has no default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當內容會編頁碼，會更新此值。This value is updated as content is paginated. 由於非固定格式內容有沒有固定的分頁的概念，因此如果調整檢視器，或若要顯示的內容已經過修改，就可能會變更這個屬性的值。Because flow content has no notion of fixed pages, the value of this property may change if the viewer is resized, or if the content being displayed is modified. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您衍生自，您會需要此金鑰，才能設定的值相依性屬性。If you derive from , you need this key in order to set the value of the dependency property. 呼叫，並傳遞做為`key`參數。Call , passing as the `key` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PageViews As ReadOnlyCollection(Of DocumentPageView)

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得包含於此檢視器內作用中 物件的唯讀集合。

span.span: Gets a read-only collection of the active objects contained within the viewer.

value.span: 內含於此檢視器內作用中 物件的唯讀集合。

span.span: A read-only collection of the active objects contained within the viewer.
This property has no default value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A提供的特定頁面的內容檢視區 (由基礎)。A provides a viewport for a particular page of content (represented by an underlying ). 一組物件所表示檢視器會使用屬性以顯示內容。The set of objects represented by the property is used by the viewer in order to display content. 主版頁面對應至物件 (在集合)，其中包含附加屬性值是**true**。The master page corresponds to the object (in the collection) that includes the attached property with a value of **true**. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

summary.span: 當與這個檢視器 (由 屬性表示) 相關聯之 項目的集合變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the collection of items associated with this viewer (represented by the property) changes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PreviousPage() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 導致檢視器跳到目前文件 (由 屬性表示) 的上一頁。

span.span: Causes the viewer to jump to the previous page of the current document (represented by the property).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Print() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 叫用標準 [列印] 對話方塊，可用來列印檢視器的內容，並設定列印喜好設定。

span.span: Invokes a standard **Print** dialog which can be used to print the contents of the viewer and configure printing preferences.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖顯示的標準範例**列印**對話方塊。The following figure shows an example of a standard **Print** dialog. 請注意，特定的外觀**列印**對話方塊可能會依據主機服務電腦的組態而有所不同。Note that the specific appearance of the **Print** dialog may vary depending on the hosting computer's configuration. ![螢幕擷取畫面: [列印] 對話方塊](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "螢幕擷取畫面： 列印 對話方塊")![Screenshot: Print dialog box](~/add/media/flowdocrdr-print.png "Screenshot: Print dialog box")
